= Get Spots =

== Actions ==

 * Create a user or update its _last connection_ field in the database.
 * Initialize the php session.

== Request ==
<table cellspacing="4" border="0">
 <tr><td>*URL*</td><td>[http://fabienrenaud.com/armp/www/loginUser.php]</td></tr>
 <tr><td>*Method*</td><td>POST</td></tr>
 <tr><td>*Authentication*</td><td>Not Required. Optional</td></tr>
</table>

Mandatory parameters:
 * udid = _string_ Represents the Unique Device ID of the user's phone
 * facebookId = 0 ≤ _int_ ≤ 4294967295
 * facebookName = _string_

Optional parameters:
 * _None_

== Response ==

That WS returns the default XML response. [WS_DefaultResponse More...]
